item.title: Jonathan Rhodes Technical Rider
item.description: Jonathan Rhodes Rider - Duo We're looking forward to playing at your venue! To prevent any miscommunication, we try to be as thorough as possible. We really appreciate all technicians who make our shows possible and we're flexible as long as communication is clear. ðŸ¤ Line-up Duo Shows Name Instrument Technical needs Jonathan Lead Vocal Vocal Mic Acoustic Guitar DI (usually brings own DI, but please have on hand) DaniÃ«l Backing Vocal Vocal Mic Electric Guitar mic for amp Acoustic Guitar DI PA The venue is expected to provide a quality PA system suitable for the (size of the) venue, capable of amplifying the line-up mentioned above.
